sentences.sContent: She broke into a trot (= started running slowly ) and hurried on ahead of us.
sentences.sCn: 她突然小跑起来，赶到我们前头。

synos.tran: （人）慢跑；马小跑的步态；小跑的马蹄声；刚学步的小孩；老太婆；腹泻；（学生作弊用的）译文对照本

words.tran: 猪脚；小跑步的马；快步走的人；当跑腿的人

trans.tranCn: （人）慢跑；马小跑的步态；小跑的马蹄声；刚学步的小孩；老太婆；腹泻；（学生作弊用的）译文对照本
trans.tranOther: a fairly slow way of running in which you take short regular steps
if a horse trots, it moves fairly quickly with each front leg moving at the same time as the opposite back leg
